titleStmt.title: The first part of the elementarie vvhich entreateth chefelie of the right writing of our English tung, set furth by Richard Mulcaster.
titleStmt.author: Mulcaster, Richard, 1530?-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the blak-friers by Lud-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
